docs.snippet: Amazon’s nationwide jobs fair on Wednesday offered a vivid illustration of its ascendance and seemingly insatiable need for workers to fuel its growth.

headline.main: Amazon’s Jobs Fair Sends Clear Message: Now Hiring Thousands

docs.snippet: The major networks are unveiling their offerings for the coming television season to advertising buyers. Our reporters discuss what they saw on the second day.

headline.print_headline: Fox Pitches Sports to Advertisers, but Specter of Its News Scandal Lingers
headline.main: As Fox Pitches Sports to Advertisers, Specter of News Scandal Lingers

docs.snippet: Why the Republican Party has adopted a position at odds with science.
Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

headline.main: China, Russia, White House: Your Friday Briefing

docs.snippet: New York Times readers debated live-or-die tests for dogs, which animal shelters use when evaluating aggression in dogs.

headline.print_headline: The Test Was ‘Bogus’: Readers Debate Live-or-Die Tests for Dogs
headline.main: The Test Was ‘Bogus’: Readers Debate Live-or-Die Tests for Dogs

docs.snippet: The president signed legislation imposing sanctions on Russia and limiting his own authority to lift them, but called some provisions “clearly unconstitutional.”

headline.print_headline: Trump Signs Sanctions Bill, but Calls It ‘Clearly Unconstitutional’
headline.main: Trump Signs Russian Sanctions Into Law, With Caveats

docs.snippet: “Vegas is one of those places that is always changing and always staying the same,” said the photographer Ryan Shorosky, who has been documenting its people for several years.
An Uber board member’s claim that female directors talk too much and the cutting short of Kamala Harris at a Senate hearing illustrate an experience that academic studies confirm.

headline.main: The Universal Phenomenon of Men Interrupting Women

docs.snippet: Since the earliest days of social media, The New York Times has published on a host of platforms. Now we’re adding Snapchat Discover to the mix.

headline.print_headline: Introducing All the News That’s Fit to Snap
headline.main: Introducing All the News That’s Fit to Snap

docs.snippet: What if the problem we face is not too many black-hat hackers, but too few white-hat ones?

headline.print_headline: A Solution  To Hackers?  Add More  Hackers
headline.main: A Solution to Hackers? More Hackers
